What are the treatments for FG syndrome ?,These resources address the diagnosis or management of FG syndrome:  - Gene Review: Gene Review: MED12-Related Disorders  - Genetic Testing Registry: FG syndrome  - Genetic Testing Registry: FG syndrome 2  - Genetic Testing Registry: FG syndrome 3  - Genetic Testing Registry: FG syndrome 4  - Genetic Testing Registry: FG syndrome 5  -
